metadata.synopsis: Behavior ADs for Mystic Carrion where he is communing with spirits
metadata.how_to_trigger: Reach Mystic Carrion in CTY_Main_A 14; 8; -160 (not implemented yet, will be implemented in behavior phase)

0.speaker: Mystic Carrion
0.text: Come closer, spirits, I have need of you...
0.context: NodeContext: Low, sonorous - in communion with the spirits

1.speaker: Mystic Carrion
1.text: Do not think to disobey. You are under my compulsion, spectre.
1.context: NodeContext: Low, sonorous - in communion with the spirits

2.speaker: Mystic Carrion
2.text: You have done well. You are released - for now.
2.context: NodeContext: Low, sonorous - in communion with the spirits

3.speaker: Mystic Carrion
3.text: You carry strange tidings. Strange indeed.
3.context: NodeContext: Low, sonorous - in communion with the spirits
